participant_1.background:
After work, I like to play guitar and practice my music with my picks and strings.
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
i have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
I'm comfortable with my own company and don't need music to keep me entertained.
I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun.

participant_2.background:
I have a deep appreciation for the color green because it reminds me of the lush forests surrounding my cabin.
I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.
I often snack too much on sweets, even though I know it's not good for my health.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
i ve been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
How was your day?
It was good! I played soccer at the park and went for a walk in the forest.
Oh nice! I'm a bit jealous! I would love to go for a walk in the forest.
It's very calming and relaxing. I love the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
I bet! I love the color green. It reminds me of the lush forests surrounding my cabin.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go camping in a cabin.
It's so much fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play guitar and make pottery. I also play soccer on the weekends.
Oh nice! I love music too. I play the piano and sing.
That's awesome! I wish I could sing.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that!
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks! I hope so.
You're welcome!
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
You too
